narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Zahid Aslam is a Obstetrics & Gynecology provider based in Elkton, MD. From 2018-01 through 2018-05, this provider received $69K in Medicaid payments across 969 claims serving 368 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.9× the national median for 99213 (99213), at $73 per claim vs. the median of $38, placing them above the 90th percentile.
89% of billing is concentrated in 99213 (99213), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-05, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
